org.jgrapes.core.events

Class Stop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<Void>
        • org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<Void>, Criterion

    public class Stop
extends Event<Void>

    An event that causes an application to shut down. All components that generate events should stop doing so after handling this event.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase

        channels

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stop()
      Create a new stop event with the event’s channels set to Channel.BROADCAST.
